DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence of intestinal helminths is worldwide. This study will evaluate the tolerability of a novel food product consumed by adults residing in an area endemic for helminths.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of a Novel Food Product in Adults Residing in an Area Endemic for Helminths
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male or Female adults, age 1845 years old inclusive on date of screening Showing presence of no or mildmoderate helminths Presence of heavy helminth load Pregnant or lactating Hepatosplenomegaly or clinically significant abnormal hemoglobin, LAT or creatinine
